commands.name: file.new
commands.description: Creates a new empty document

commands.name: file.load
commands.description: Opens a file dialog to load a markdown file

commands.name: file.save
commands.description: Saves the current document

commands.name: file.saveAs
commands.description: Opens a save dialog to save the document with a new name

commands.name: document.undo
commands.description: Undoes the last action

commands.name: document.redo
commands.description: Redoes the last undone action

commands.name: document.getContent
commands.description: Gets the current document content as markdown

commands.name: document.setContent
commands.description: Sets the document content from markdown

commands.name: document.insertText
commands.description: Inserts text at the current cursor position

commands.name: view.setMode
commands.description: Sets the view mode

commands.name: view.getMode
commands.description: Gets the current view mode

commands.name: element.changeType
commands.description: Changes the type of the current element

type.description: The new element type (heading1-6, paragraph, blockquote, code, list, etc.)

commands.name: element.applyFormat
commands.description: Applies inline formatting to the current selection

format.description: The format to apply (bold, italic, code, strikethrough, link)

commands.name: cursor.getPosition
commands.description: Gets the current cursor position

commands.name: cursor.setPosition
commands.description: Sets the cursor position

commands.name: selection.get
commands.description: Gets the current selection

commands.name: selection.set
commands.description: Sets the selection range

commands.name: app.reload
commands.description: Reloads the application UI while preserving document content, cursor position, and file association

commands.name: file.getRecentFiles
commands.description: Gets the list of recently opened file paths (most recent first)

commands.name: image.rename
commands.description: Renames an image file on disk

oldPath.description: The current absolute file path of the image

newName.description: The new filename (not a full path)
